#summary How to attach images to wiki pages.
#labels HowTo

= It's quite simple =
You should do these easy steps:
 # clone the wiki repository
{{{
git clone https://grigory.rechistov@code.google.com/p/mipt-ilab-course.wiki
}}}
 # store your image in the newly repository folder
 # attach image to wiki
{{{
[http://wiki.mipt-ilab-course.googlecode.com/git/descent.png]
}}}
